mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (articleno, boardcd, title, content, email, hit, regdate) VALUES (seq_article.nextval, #{boardCd}, #{title}, #{content}, #{email}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT boardNm FROM board WHERE boardcd = #{boardCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE articleno = #{articleNo}
mapper.select: SELECT articleno, title FROM (SELECT rownum r,a.* FROM (SELECT articleno, title FROM article WHERE boardCd = #{boardCd} AND articleno > #{articleNo} ORDER BY articleno) a) WHERE r = 1
SELECT articleno, title FROM (SELECT rownum r,a.* FROM (SELECT articleno, title FROM article WHERE boardCd = #{boardCd} AND articleno < #{articleNo} ORDER BY articleno DESC) a) WHERE r = 1
SELECT articleno, title, content, email, hit, regdate FROM (SELECT * FROM ARTICLE ORDER BY articleno DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachfile (attachfileno, filename, filetype, filesize, articleno) VALUES (seq_attachfile.nextval, #{filename}, #{filetype}, #{filesize}, #{articleNo})
mapper.select: SELECT attachfileno, filename, filetype, filesize, articleno FROM attachfile WHERE articleno = #{articleNo} ORDER BY attachfileno
